subject: Your Meeting Confirmation - {{ booking_reference }}
email_body:
Dear {{ customer_name }},

Thank you for scheduling a meeting with BestSecurity.

Meeting Details:

  • Date: {{ event_date }}
  • Time: {{ event_time }}
  • Consultant: {{ provider }}

Your consultant will contact you at the scheduled time.

Before the meeting, you can install our remote support software:

Install Remote Support Software

Need to make changes?

Reschedule Meeting | Cancel Meeting

Best regards,
{{ booker }}
BestSecurity

subject: Your Business Meeting Confirmation
email_body:
Hi {{ company }},
Attn: {{ customer_name }},

Thank you for the great conversation we just had.

As agreed, I am sending you an email regarding your scheduled meeting.

My colleague {{ provider }} will call you on {{ event_date }} at {{ event_time }}

I have also attached our business brochure so you can learn more about us.

BestSecurity ApS is one of Denmark's leading IT companies, with offices at Christians Brygge 28, 1559 Copenhagen V and Anelystparken 31, 8381 Tilst.

Phone Hours:
Mon–Thu: 09:00–17:00
Fri: 09:00–16:30

Meeting Hours:
Mon–Thu: 07:00–17:00
Fri: 07:00–15:00

The security check is expected to take 30–45 minutes. During the session, our IT technician will cover IT security, backup, and GDPR.

Before our call, it would help if you click the link below to install our remote support software:

Install Remote Support Software

We look forward to assisting you.

Best regards,
{{ booker }}
Business Consultant, BestSecurity

subject: Your Meeting Confirmation
email_body:
Dear {{ customer_name }},

Thank you for the conversation.

As agreed, I am sending you the meeting details.

My colleague, {{ provider }}, will call you on: {{ event_datetime }}

If you need to reschedule, please call us at (+45) 82 82 82 35.

Please click the link below to install our remote support software:

Install Remote Support Software

At BestSecurity, we have protected over 20,000 households and 1,500 businesses in Denmark since 2017. We aim to give you peace of mind and secure your digital life.

Best regards,
{{ booker }}
BestSecurity

subject: New Meeting Assignment: {{ booking_reference }}
email_body:
Hi {{ recipient_name }},

You have been assigned as the host for a new meeting.

Meeting Details:

  • Customer: {{ customer_name }}{% if company %} ({{ company }}){% endif %}
  • Date: {{ event_date }}
  • Time: {{ event_time }}
  • Duration: {{ duration }} minutes
  • Service Type: {{ service_type }}

Customer Contact:

  • Email: {{ customer_email }}
    • {% if customer_phone %}
  • Phone: {{ customer_phone }}
    • {% endif %}

Booked by: {{ booker }}

subject: Update to Your Meeting - {{ booking_reference }}
email_body:
Dear {{ customer_name }},

There has been a change to your upcoming meeting.

Your new consultant will be {{ provider }}.

Meeting Details (unchanged):

  • Date: {{ event_date }}
  • Time: {{ event_time }}

{{ provider }} will contact you at the scheduled time.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
BestSecurity

We hope to assist you in the future.

Best regards,
BestSecurity
